message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the rate of inflation we are dealing with. Let's settle this quickly and both benefit.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, given the inflation rates. It allows us both to get a decent share while minimizing the impact of inflation.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but your offer in Round 2 would have left me worse off than your rejected offer in Round 1. To reach a fair agreement, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This reflects the urgency for me to settle due to the higher inflation I face.
